name: WordswithFriendsWordPop
0:
”Alexa, open Word Pop”
”Alexa, play Word Pop”
”Alexa, play Words with Friends Word Pop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word pop
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Word Pop is a fast, fun word puzzle game from the creators of the popular mobile word game, Words with Friends. Test your spelling and vocabulary skills by guessing as many 3-to-6 letter words as you can in 60 seconds using the six letters provided.

Just say, "Alexa, play Word Pop" to get started! Play multiple days and games in a row to earn bonus points. Earn achievements as you level up and boost your word skills!

Remember, say "Alexa" before each guess to let her listen and record your guess.

Here are some other helpful things you can say:
* Forget your letters? Say, "Alexa, repeat letters" to hear them again and if you’re playing on a device without a screen, check your Alexa app to see them as well.
* Playing on a device with a screen? Say "Alexa, shuffle" to reorganize the letters on screen to help you guess some words.
* Forget what words you’ve guessed? Say "Alexa, what words have I guessed?" to hear a list of your words and if you’re playing on a device without a screen, check your Alexa app to see them as well.
* Want to know how much time is left? Say, "Alexa, how much time is left?".

Want to truly master Word Pop? Check out these pro tips:
1. If you’re playing on a device without a screen, try writing down the letters or check the Activity pane of your Alexa app for the letters. It helps to see them.
2. Some words sound the same but are spelled differently, and Alexa may not know which one you’re trying to guess. If you’re having trouble with word recognition, try spelling it out instead of saying it.
3. When you ask for help, Alexa pauses the timer so you’re not penalized for learning how to play!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
